H0.text: The troposphere contains about 75 % of the gasses and almost all of the water vapor in the atmosphere.

H1.text: Stratosphere is the layer of the atmosphere that contains about 75 % of the gasses and almost all of the water vapor.

H2.text: Mesosphere is the layer of the atmosphere that contains about 75 % of the gases and almost all of the water vapor.

H3.text: The thermosphere is the layer of the atmosphere that contains about 75 % of the gases and almost all of the water vapor.

A4.text: It contains 80% of the total mass of the planetary atmosphere and 99% of the total mass of water vapor and aerosols, and is where most weather phenomena occur.
